body_html:
For single machine training you can start with tf.keras.Model. Once your ready to scale, use that Model in a model_fn, or use model_to_estimator.

Maybe there's a way to do interactive training in a way that still allows you to scale without forcing people to rethink their models, but I have no solution to that (the workflow above using Keras is the best I've seen).

body:
For single machine training you can start with tf.keras.Model. Once your ready to scale, use that Model in a model_fn, or use model_to_estimator. 

Maybe there's a way to do interactive training in a way that still allows you to scale without forcing people to rethink their models, but I have no solution to that (the workflow above using Keras is the best I've seen).
